__TOC__

This pages is being used to keep track of the Apps that I or my friends recommend. If you want me to try out an app or you want to recommend one let me know.  You can add your recommendations just make sure you list it as being recommended by you.  See format below.

=== Chrome Apps ===

* '''Feedly''' - Feedly is a news reader for creative minds. Seamless migration from Google Reader.https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/feedly-your-news-rss-goog/hipbfijinpcgfogaopmgehiegacbhmob - (recommended by Amber Graner)

* '''Do``Not``Track``Me''' - DoNotTrackMe protects your privacy by blocking online tracking. - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/donottrackme/epanfjkfahimkgomnigadpkobaefekcd?hl=en  - (recommended by Joey Stanford)

* '''CIRC''' - An IRC client for Chrome - https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/circ/bebigdkelppomhhjaaianniiifjbgocn (recommended by Amber Graner)

=== Android Apps ===

* '''Paper``Karma''' - Paper``Karma lets you take photos of the unwanted mail you want to stop. Snap a photo, and you're done. - https://www.paperkarma.com/ - (recommended by Steve Conklin)
